**Government Tender Announcement: Roof Replacement 000 Block - SAS-01**
===============================================

### Project Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016288
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58106
* **Publication Date**: December 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2023, 15:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified

### Tender Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking contractors to replace the roof of the 000 Block building located at 110 Gymnasium Place, Saskatoon, SK. The scope of work includes roof removal, disposal, and replacement of the specified roof systems.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required for all bidding contractors. The visit will take place on January 4th and 5th, 2023, at 10:00 am. At least one representative from each contractor must attend. Proof of attendance is required and will be verified by signing an attendance form.

### Tender Requirements

* The contractor must provide security clearance to RELIABILITY status level as defined in the security policy of Canada.
* The contractor must provide a valid WORKSAFE Saskatchewan certificate with their tender or prior to contract award.

### Dispute Resolution

The parties understand that the Procurement Ombudsman will review any dispute or complaint regarding the administration of the contract. The Office of the Procurement Ombudsman (OPO) may be contacted by telephone at 1-866-734-5169 or by email at [boa.opo@boa-opc.gc.ca](mailto:boa.opo@boa-opc.gc.ca).

The tender package and addenda can be obtained through the Buyandsell.gc.ca TMA services provider. The documents are available in both English and French.
